transcript.title: Rudd Wrong on Military Commission
transcript.content:
Last night on the Lateline program, the Leader of the Opposition, Mr Kevin Rudd, falsely claimed that there would be no presumption of innocence should David Hicks face trial before a Military Commission. This claim, which he has made before, is completely wrong.

The Military Commission Act of 2006 provides in section 949 (l)(c)(1) that
